text: 10.19-20 Jon 14.26, 1 Ko 2.4 Pen nɨbop kot gɨnɨgabal anɨb ak, gos kuŋay ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Won anɨb ak owaknɨŋ, God ne nɨbop gos ñek takaw anɨb ak agɨnɨmɨb agak. Anɨb apin, Nap Kawnan ne ak nɨbop gos ñek, takaw anɨb ak nɨbi ke ma agɨnɨgabɨm, Nap Kawnan ne ak agɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb ak takaw tɨtay agɨnɨgun akaŋ, kɨlop pen takaw tay ak dɨl agɨnɨgun agɨl, gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak.
